quote: The chief cause of failure and unhappiness is trading what you want most for what you want right now. – Zig Ziglar
fact: The 57 on the Heinz ketchup bottle represents the number of pickle types the company once had.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Have you heard about corduroy pillows?  They're making headlines!
